pages.title: About
pages.text: This is the About Page on this website. About XUOGROUPXUOGROUP is a game development organization which was found in Mar. 2019. We have developed several games: XUO Series (Not released) Minecraft MOD: Elements of Harmony (This) Not much (maybe only a few), since we don’t have much experience, but trust us, soon (but not yet), you will find an amazing game which is made by us! Cross my heart and hope to fly, stick a cupcake in my eye! Most of these games are (or will be) released under a GNU General Public License, yes, we develop free games more than commercial games. Want to contact us? Public Inbox Protected Inbox Private Inbox GitHub XUOGROUP is a non-profit organization. About My Little PonyNotice: This page is translated by machine. Copied from WikiPedia. My Little Pony is a toy line and media franchise mainly targeting girls, developed by American toy company Hasbro. The first toys were developed by Bonnie Zacherle, Charles Muenchinger, and Steve D’Aguanno, and were produced in 1981. The ponies feature colorful bodies, manes and a unique symbol on one or both sides of their flanks. Such symbols are referred to in the two most recent incarnations as “cutie marks”. My Little Pony has been revamped several times with new and more modern looks to continue its appeal to the market. Following the original My Pretty Pony toy that was introduced in 1981, My Little Pony was launched in 1982 and the line became popular during the 1980s. The original toy line ran from 1982 to 1992 in the United States and to 1995 globally, and two animated specials, an animated feature-length film and two animated television series produced during the period up until 1992. The first incarnation’s popularity peaked in 1990, but the following year Hasbro decided to discontinue the toy line due to increased competition. One hundred fifty million ponies were sold in the 1980s. The toy line was revived in 1997, but these toys proved unpopular and were discontinued in 1999. The brand saw a more popular revival in 2003 with toys that more closely resembled the original toy line,which sold approximately 100 million pony toys globally by 2010. Hasbro launched the fourth incarnation of the franchise in 2010, which started with the animated series My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic, which has ended since October 12, 2019. The brand grossed over $650 million in retail sales in 2013, and over $1 billion annually in retail sales in 2014 and 2015. posts.title: Welcome!
posts.excerpt: Hi there! If this is your first time to this website, read this page to learn about Elements of Harmony and us, XUOGROUP. If not, just continue your reading, have a nice day!
posts.text: Hi there! If this is your first time to this website, read this page to learn about Elements of Harmony and us, XUOGROUP. If not, just continue your reading, have a nice day! Hello for your visiting this instruction page. This is Andy-K-Sparklight speaking. You may feel strange about my avatar, that’s because… Andy has a crush on Rainbow Dash! Nope, not at all. (That must be Fish Chan) Elements of Harmony, just like it’s name, is a Minecraft MOD, and, obviously, is inspired of My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic. This MOD, which is build with Forge API, inserts six Elements of Harmony into Minecraft. These elements are: Loyalty Laughter Generosity Honesty Kindness Magic (They are arranged in the order in My Little Pony Theme Song) All we want to do is to make Minecraft as close as possible to Equestria, and Elements of Harmony is an essential part. It includes: Six Elements, including their various forms. Advancements of your life in Minecraft. (Not Featured) A (or more) Dimension(s) for Equestria. (Not Featured) Basic Support for further development. (Not Featured) Yes, we’re still in progress, you can Watch, Star our repo on GitHub. Feel free to open an Issue or a Pull Request! About us: XUOGROUP has following members now (still appending): Andy K Sparklight (AG), the leader and the main author & developer. Fish Chan(CSY), the supporter. K Twily, a cute child who always has some questions. Want to join or help? Mail to us: Private Inbox Public Inbox OK, that’s all, thank you for reading!
